monitoring.failedWaitingRetry: Queue task {{taskId}} failed - waiting for retry (attempt {{attempt}} of {{maxAttempts}}) ({{teamName}} - {{machineName}})
monitoring.permanentlyFailed: Queue task {{taskId}} permanently failed after {{attempts}} attempts ({{teamName}} - {{machineName}})
monitoring.queuedForRetry: Queue task {{taskId}} queued for retry (attempt {{attempt}} of {{maxAttempts}}) ({{teamName}} - {{machineName}})
monitoring.staleTask: Queue task {{taskId}} appears to be stale (no progress for {{minutes}} minutes)

queueManager.alreadyHasPriority1: You already have a highest priority task running on bridge {{bridgeName}}. Please wait for it to complete.
queueManager.description: Highest priority queue items (priority 1) are managed to ensure only one task runs per bridge at a time.
queueManager.emptyState: No highest priority items in queue
queueManager.taskCancelled: Task cancelled: Already have a priority 1 task on this bridge
queueManager.title: Queue Manager

selectTeam: Select a team to view queue items

active.description: This section displays all active tasks including pending items waiting for assignment, tasks being processed by machines, and tasks in the process of being cancelled.
active.title: Active Queue
active.tooltip: Shows all pending, assigned, processing, and cancelling tasks. Includes tasks waiting to be picked up and those currently being executed.

cancelled.description: This section displays all tasks that were cancelled by user request. These tasks were stopped before completion.
cancelled.title: Cancelled
cancelled.tooltip: Shows all cancelled tasks that were stopped by user request

completed.description: This section displays all tasks that have been successfully completed without errors.
completed.title: Completed

failed.description: This section displays all tasks that failed due to errors during execution. Tasks may be retried up to 2 times before being permanently marked as failed.
failed.title: Failed
failed.tooltip: Shows all failed tasks that encountered errors during execution

taskStatus.cancelledDescription: The task was cancelled and will not be processed.
taskStatus.completedDescription: The task finished successfully after {{minutes}} minutes.
taskStatus.failedDescription: The task has failed permanently after {{retries}} retries.

title: Queue Management
